data.title: Macro Expert Raoul Pal Explains Why He's More Bullish on Ethereum (ETH) Than Bitcoin (BTC)
data.text: Real Vision CEO and macro guru Raoul Pal says he believes leading smart contract platform Ethereum (ETH) will likely outperform Bitcoin (BTC) in the long run. In a new interview on Crypto Banter, Pal says that even though the top crypto asset by market cap beats ETH in total trading volume and number of active […] The post Macro Expert Raoul Pal Explains Why He's More Bullish on Ethereum (ETH) Than Bitcoin (BTC) appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
